ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands

Class IdleCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.ShipCommand
      • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.IdleCommand

  • public class IdleCommand
extends ShipCommand
    A command to cause a ship to do nothing for a period of time. Useful for waiting for non-blocking commands to finish or getting updated environment data without performing an action.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IdleCommand(double duration)
      Creates a command to wait for a specified amount of time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getOngoingEnergyCost()
      Gets the energy cost per second of this command.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IdleCommand

        public IdleCommand(double duration)
        Creates a command to wait for a specified amount of time. The ship will not be able to act during this time.
        Parameters:
        duration - the number of seconds for which to idle

    • Method Detail

      • getOngoingEnergyCost

        public static int getOngoingEnergyCost()
        Gets the energy cost per second of this command.
        Returns:
        the amount of energy consumed per second while this command is executing (1)
